text: The pipa () is a four-stringed Chinese musical instrument, belonging to the plucked category of instruments (弹拨乐器/彈撥樂器). ==Books== *New Grove Dictionary of Music and Musicians, second edition, edited by Stanley Sadie and John Tyrrell (London, 2001). ==Other websites== * "Kishibe's diffusionism theory on the Iranian Barbat and Chino-Japanese Pi' Pa'," from The Shayda Institute- Iranian Classical Music site * An article on the historical development of pipa * The Pipa on the Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History, The Metropolitan Museum of Art * Pipa Performance by Gifted Musician in United States Category:Chinese music Category:Chinese musical instruments
title: Pipa
